title: Interview Transcript V1
description: Structured format for interview transcripts with categorization tags. Optionally include interview_date if the transcript clearly contains it.

interview_date.description: Ngày phỏng vấn (YYYY-MM-DD) hoặc null nếu không xác định được

interview_summary.description: A comprehensive summary of the interview content

key_insights.description: Key insights or findings from the interview

participant_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment of the interview participant(s)
